conversations.output: Mohamed Harris is the founder of BapX Media Hub and the creator of the bapX system. His vision is to create systems where cognition is always free with lifetime, memory and Context based recall. BapX Media Hub is a private company where cognition is always free with lifetime/project based memory and Context based recall On the connected tools based session.
